org.activebpel.rt.xml
Class AeXMLParserErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      org.activebpel.rt.xml.AeXMLParserErrorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeSaxErrorRelayHandler
public class AeXMLParserErrorHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler

Class used to process errors encountered during parse operation. This class extends DefaultHandler so that it may be used by the SAX parser.
